> [{quoted}](name=iSmîle,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=KKbT8Ne4,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-07-04T04:58:24.072+0000)
>
> since a couple months the game seems to place me in games that i dont belong to . EVERY game was placing me against smurff (mostly korean / asian ) . always unfair game where we would get beat up back to back and im talking normal games not ranked . since ive reached platinum 4 i feel like im where i belong to . iam not bad at the game and im far from pro . so since i reached my *ranked goal* ive been playing league mostly for fun , playing normal game so i dont have to try hard and try new champ and build. but like i said , every game was HARDER than my ranked match . i understand that game cannot always be fair and its hard to place you versus opponent with the same skill level in normal but it became just not fun anymore . no one in my game where even speaking english . even got placed in a challenger vs optic academy game .... the fun was taking out of me . it lead me to become mad AT THE GAME ITSELF . not the player . just how unfair every match were and that i wasnt allowed to have fun in a game that i enjoy . always placed in matches that i wasnt belonging to .

This is not why you are banned.

Only if it's in error, which this one appears not to be.

> [{quoted}](name=iSmîle,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=KKbT8Ne4,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-07-04T04:58:24.072+0000)
>
> and honestly i feel like taking a break

Probably for the best. If you do choose do create a new account when you finish your break, I recommend not playing ranked.

Permanent ban means you were punished before. You are not likely to be unbanned, as it was not because of **bad matchmaking**, it was because of your inability to follow the game's rules. What other people are doing is not an excuse for you to lose control and fly off the handle on your team.

Additionally, a permanent ban is the **very last** punishment - you had your chances to reform.
did you read or you just commented without reading ?
i understand the rules and the reason of my ban . i understand that my game experience shouldnt lead me to ruin other player experience with the game

The boards are not able to help you here, only riot support (contacted through a support ticket) can. As a tip, I would recommend not blaming matchmaking, it can make it seem like you feel the toxicity wasn't your fault/you don't have anything to reform. Be polite and explain your case and perhaps a bit on your goal of reforming, and the worst that can happen is they say no.
thanks for the tip and i did send them a ticket :)

Although I do not support toxicity, I do understand how uncomfortable it is to play with 4 Chinese people who are literally typing Chinese in the chat. I think that the riot’s matchmaking system is sometimes very broken, and you just got the bad end of the stick. If you don’t get unbanned, i think taking a break is the right way to go, buy if you really want to, contact a riot support member. Hopefully they will help you. Please tell us if u get unbanned!

neither do i . like i said ive been playing since 2008-2009 . and ive never been banned until this year . it just became lame and not fun at all . always matched with try hards that made my experience very bad . even in ARAM i was playing vs smurff its not even a joke lol . using op.gg to know what was i facing and it was jsut not making any sens. and i doubt a perma can be lifted but i sure will do let you know .

thank you for the comment . we all know how toxic and tilting a game can quickly become . but sometimes i think the game itself doesnt help with it . like i said how can you not tilt when EVERY game you play places you vs lvl 20-30 account that are asian smurff ( i got nothing against asian people we just know how good most of them are ) . if it was one game on twenty i wouldnt care but since the past 6-7 months ALL my games are like this . and i have no idea why . even my friend dont want to play with me cause it places us with people we dont even understand why were placed against .... anyways
